products.name: Monstera (Monstera deliciosa) - The Swiss Cheese Star
products.description: Monstera deliciosa is like the cool kid of the plant world. Its iconic, holey leaves scream style and bring tropical vibes to any room. Perfect for Instagram-worthy corners. 🌴
products.watering: Keep soil moderately moist; water once a week

products.name: Aloe Vera (Aloe barbadensis miller) - Your Healing Hero
products.description: Aloe Vera is nature’s little miracle worker. Whether you’re looking to soothe sunburns or just want a stylish, fuss-free plant, Aloe Vera has got your back. It’s low maintenance, and let’s be real—who doesn’t love a plant that thrives on a little neglect? 🌿
products.watering: Water sparingly, about once every 2-3 weeks

products.name: Succulents (Various Species)
products.description: Are you a plant parent or just love things that thrive on neglect? This mix of succulents is your new best friend! Hardy, stylish, and ridiculously low-maintenance — perfect for your busy (or lazy) self.
products.watering: Water lightly, every 2-4 weeks

products.name: Japanese Maple (Acer palmatum) - Fall’s Showstopper
products.description: Add a touch of elegance with the Japanese Maple. Its delicate leaves turn stunning shades of red and orange in autumn, making your garden the envy of the neighborhood. 🍁
products.watering: Regular watering, especially during dry spells

products.name: Boxwood (Buxus sempervirens) - The Evergreen Artist
products.description: Who said hedges couldn’t be fun? Boxwood is perfect for crafting neat borders or whimsical topiary shapes. Give your garden that classic, sophisticated look—minus the drama. 🌳
products.watering: Water regularly, especially during dry periods

products.name: Golden Bamboo (Phyllostachys aurea) - The Tropical Transformer
products.description: Ready to add a tropical vibe to your garden? Golden Bamboo is fast-growing and fabulous, doubling as a privacy screen when you need some “me time” outdoors. 🏝️
products.watering: Keep soil moist but well-drained

products.name: Boston Ivy (Parthenocissus tricuspidata)
products.description: Dreaming of a lush, ivy-covered wall? Boston Ivy is your go-to! This speedy grower will transform your space into a scene straight out of a romantic movie, with its leaves putting on a fiery red show every fall. 🌱
products.watering: Keep soil moderately moist

products.name: Orchid (Phalaenopsis) - Elegance in Bloom
products.description: Phalaenopsis Orchids bring a touch of exotic luxury to your home. With blooms that last forever (well, almost), it’s perfect for plant newbies and pros alike. Oh, and it makes a killer last-minute gift! 🌼
products.watering: Once every 1-2 weeks

products.name: Lily (Lilium)
products.description: Few plants can compete with the stunning beauty of Lilies. Their vibrant blooms and intoxicating fragrance will brighten any space, indoors or out. Plus, they’re easier to care for than they look. 🌸
products.watering: Keep soil moist but not soggy

products.name: Cushion Moss (Leucobryum glaucum) - The Zen Maker
products.description: Bring the calm of a mossy forest floor into your home. Cushion Moss adds texture, tranquility, and a soft, velvety touch to your terrariums. It’s like a tiny green pillow for your plants to rest on. 🌿
products.watering: Mist occasionally to maintain moisture

products.name: Monstera (Monstera deliciosa) - The Swiss Cheese Star
products.description: Monstera deliciosa is like the cool kid of the plant world. Its iconic, holey leaves scream style and bring tropical vibes to any room. Perfect for Instagram-worthy corners. 🌴
